name: MRScreenCapture
description:
Capture screen software that works on the windows tray.

You capture the screen by pressing the capture button.

The capture files are saved in a user folder and you can recover them.

You can edit the image:

  • You can select an area
  • Crop the area
  • Copy the area to the clipboard
  • Add Rectangles to the image
  • Add Lines to the image
  • Add Arrows To the images
  • You can select the size and the color of the border
  • You can add the border of the picture.
